desc: Overnight: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind around 9 mph.
Thursday: Mostly cloudy, then gradually becoming sunny, with a high near 65. West wind 8 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.
Thursday Night: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. West wind 12 to 17 mph becoming light southwest  after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 22 mph.
Friday: Sunny, with a high near 71. Calm wind.
Friday Night: Mostly clear, with a low around 56. West wind 5 to 7 mph becoming calm  in the evening.
Saturday: Sunny, with a high near 69.
Saturday Night: Clear, with a low around 56.
Sunday: Sunny, with a high near 69.
Sunday Night: Clear, with a low around 56.
